Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Molto allegro in G major, KV 72a

no later than 1770 · KV1,2 – · KV3,6 72a

[IMSLP]

This piece is only known from a painting of Mozart that contains it on an open page of music. The piece is incomplete and possibly spurious.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/27/2 · BA 4584-02 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Einzelstücke · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5745 · Einzelstücke für Klavier · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50229 · Klavierstücke / Band 1: Frühere Werke · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [with completion by Robert Levin]

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2
